alert.note: Alert for Crowley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 06 at 3:30PM MDT until June 06 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 329 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 14 miles northeast of Boone, or 30 miles east of Pueblo, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tennis ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ordway, Sugar City and Crowley. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
